info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:54PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Silver Bow County through 630 PM MDT... At 554 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Divide, or 18 miles southwest of Butte, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Butte, Divide, Janney, and Newcomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
